law.catch_line: Free public parking for the physically disabled.

text.section:
Sec. 30-388.2. Free public parking for the physically disabled.
Any motor vehicle which is qualified to park in a specially marked parking space designated for the physically disabled pursuant to Article II of this chapter shall be permitted to park in any public parking space in Miami-Dade County without incurring a fee for parking. For purposes of this section, the term "public parking space" shall mean a parking space provided by Miami-Dade County and each municipality within Miami-Dade County, and each agency, instrumentality and authority thereof.
